title: Hextech boxes
body: Earlier, I used to get a lotta Hextech Boxes but not now! Like, it has been quite some time since I got a box... Has getting a box become rarer now or is there a particular way I can get it? Do we even get boxes on Summoners Rift?

replies.body:
Hextech Chests are only awarded when you get S class on a champion.

There are some conditions to this though:

1. Only 4 chests per month. Check your summoner profile page to see when the next chest will be available.
2. You can't earn a Hextech Chest on the same champion twice in 1 season.
3. You need to own the champion to earn a chest on them.

More info on this and more [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide).
